ComicInfo.Penciller: Hugo Petrus,Ronan Cliquet,Salvador Espin,Hugo Petrus,Ronan Cliquet,Salvador Espin
ComicInfo.Summary:
Spinning from the World Wide Web straight to your spinner rack! Based on this summer's blockbuster films, Iron Man and The Incredible Hulk, Marvel is proud to present two stories previously available only on Marvel.Com, plus an all-new chapter from the Marvel Movieverse, not seen anywhere yet!
Iron Man: Fast Friends brings insight into the bond between Tony 'Iron Man' Stark and James 'I'm in the Air Force' Rhodes, and why they're such good buddies. The Incredible Hulk: The Fury Files features SHIELD director Nick Fury figuring out why it's a bad idea to make Bruce Banner angry.
ComicInfo.Title: Iron Man: Fast Friends; Incredible Hulk: The Fury Files; Nick Fury: Spies Like Us
